description: Update credential of this data set. Updating metadata will create an on-chain transaction you have to approve in your wallet.

data.name: allow
data.label: Allow Credential
data.help: Enter wallet address and click ADD button to append the list

data.name: deny
data.label: Deny Credential
data.help: Enter wallet address and click ADD button to append the list

data.name: isOrderDisabled
data.label: Disable Consumption
data.help: Disable dataset being consume when dataset undergoing maintenance.
